title: Debbie Allen
description:
In this episode Ellen is joined by actress, choreographer, director, and her Grey's Anatomy costar Debbie Allen.They discuss the journey of reinvention, the power of perseverance, the significance Steven Speilberg played in both of their careers, and how Ellen brought the sexy this season on Grey's Anatomy.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
